title: Need advice on swimwear logo
content:
Hi everyone,

I have been stuck on this one for a while now. I'm making this logo for the swimwear brand (men and women) that I am doing.

I'm not satisfied with the B, and when I look at it all together it just doesnt feel right. I'd like to hear your suggestions and ideas to improve it.

Thanks!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130821232938im_/http:/typophile.com/files/bainlogo%20typophile_4752.jpg)
author: ClaudeFran
